meanings.sent1: The chemicals were polymerizing in the beaker.
meanings.sent2: The plastic was slowly polymerizing in the mold.
meanings.sent3: The experiment went wrong when the solution started polymerizing too quickly.
meanings.sent4: The ideas in his mind were polymerizing into a brilliant plan.
meanings.sent5: The process of polymerizing can create strong and durable materials.

meanings.sent1: She was polymerizing the substances to form a new material.
meanings.sent2: The scientist was carefully polymerizing the compounds in the reaction.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally polymerized the ingredients, creating a sticky mess.
meanings.sent4: His words had the power to polymerize emotions in those around him.
meanings.sent5: Polymerizing different elements together can lead to interesting outcomes.
